resources.string: Your hand washing technique is great! Continue with the same techniques you are currently using to ensure the highest quality of cleanliness for your hands. Great job! :D

Your hands are not receiving the optimal cleanliness that they need. Please look over your hand washing techniques in order to improve your hand washing score. If you need guidance on performing the best hand washing techniques, please refer to CDC video on how to properly wash your hands.

Your hand washing technique can be improved. Please be sure that both back sides of your hands, fingers, and nails are properly washed. Be sure to scrub the entire sides of your fingers and all of your nails including the thumb.
